<title level="1" pfs="">[Reaper Skull Puffball](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1381)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

When this fungus detects prey, its tendrils writhe and exude a paralytic toxin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fungus](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Puffball_ReapersSkull.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Reaper Skull Puffball](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1381)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fungus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=77" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 79</row>

**Perception** +15; motion sense 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Motion Sense** The puffball senses motion through vibration and air movement.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 195

**Immunities**
bleed, [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
fire 10, piercing 10

**Spore Explosion** When the reaper skull puffball dies, it explodes, dealing 8d8 poison damage to each creature in a 20-foot emanation (DC 28 basic Fortitude save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tendril +21 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+8 plus paralysis

**Spore Cloud** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) The puffball releases a 30-foot cone of spores that deals 4d8 poison damage (DC 28 [basic Fortitude save](/Rules.aspx?ID=329)) to creatures in the cone. Creatures that fail this save are also exposed to skull rot.

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A creature hit by the puffball's tendril must succeed a DC 28 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). The paralyzed creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns.

**Skull Rot**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d8 poison damage plus [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d8 poison damage plus enfeebled 2 and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d8 poison damage plus enfeebled 2 and drained 2 (1d4 rounds)

</column>
